MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Violet Terrace and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have located the underground cable fault however due to difficult excavations we now expect your supply to be restored by 6:30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:56pm on Monday, 12 October 2020
